bow: need advice for year old birthday have plenty of experience with babies and such but drawing total blank here what are good 1st birthday ideas that are not clothes or toys birthday party *theme* ideas or *present* ideas not sure if they be offended or not was specifically asked for it but diapers and wipes were greatly appreciated not sure how expensive it is there but membership month or year or so to the aquarium or the zoo my kid loves it we basically live in the aquarium sorry present ideas did even think about diapers and wipes the mom is pregnant again so there can never be enough of those the zoo thing would be great idea except the dad works at the zoo so they get in free haha something personalized puzzle with their name personalized book see me books are great or tickets to the zoo or some family friendly activity in their area my go to first birthday gift is subscription to baby bug magazine board books not the common good night moon or trendy ones one is when they re really getting into those asked for baby books and instruments for my year old he loves to open the flaps on his books and feel different textures my sister in law got me books that all had bilingual basic words did get an instrument for him so might have to find xylophone at ross tjmaxx socks too board books sippy cups bows always do two books now book sturdy board book and later book bigger kid book maisy mouse books are great for year olds puzzles with the knob or handle to pull out pieces books baby will have no idea or understanding of what happening diapers wipes formula target gift card gift card for date night for mom amp dad babysitter included gift certificate for family photo session step stool with the child name in the top but the letters are removable puzzle blocks alphapup it at walmart they also have lion that goes from standing to walking to riding and has counting color and motor skills elements wooden puzzles foam block sets smart wheels sets from tech and pull behind wooden toys traditionally gift sterling silver piggy band with their name engraved on it you know keepsake item the indestructibles series has interesting designs and the books can survive anything toddler can throw at it highly recommended this is really fun and durable little magazine we ve had it ourselves and have gifted it to others we still have most if not all of the magazines years later my older daughter is up to the lady bug magazine now and we really look forward to it every month or two we found wooden blocks and bath toys for ton of love from one two two we found wooden blocks and bath toys for ton of love from one two two amp nbsp amp nbsp amp nbsp amp nbsp amp nbsp amp nbsp amp nbsp amp nbsp amp nbsp amp nbsp amp nbsp amp nbsp amp nbsp amp nbsp amp nbsp amp nbsp amp nbsp amp nbsp ^briannalk ^^i ^^a ^^bot ^^made ^^by ^^ eight1911 ^^i ^^detect ^^haiku one of my favorite gifts my daughter received for her first birthday was piggy bank it is not your traditional looking pig piggy bank do know how to add picture on here subscription to kid magazine highlights for would be my choice but there baby version of ranger rick and others once they get older they can change the subscription to an older kid version the highlights for babies comes in like baby proof plastic pages with cute rhymes and stories it reasonably priced and something more unique than toy plus reading to kids babies is one of the best things you can do for kid just be sure not to sign up for automatic renewal giftcards savings bonds old school man 35 and still have couple socked away books highlights hello subscription plates cups silverware bedsheets books maybe even leapfrog reading system love duplo blocks because you can always add to it and it fun to play with them when they want them out we got our son personalized book it was called lost my name but they ve got loads of book to choose from it really cute and you can semi choose the story line based off the letters in the child name ll add the url for the book website below otherwise an experience gift is always appreciated https www wonderbly com en us books or membership to zoo museum with toddler area or similar experience outing my sister in law who is very crafty made our son one of those fleece tie blankets and also bought stuffed animal to match it when my son was bit older she bought new pillow and made him cars themed pillow case toy pram and baby doll especially if he just about to start walking and again especially if he got little sibling on the way do know what it is about those kmart toy prams but they re like baby crack all babies love them my son got ride on thomas for his first birthday and still loves it he now when he was one he pushed it around now he rides it like he in the indy 500 learning toys books or not even just board books you can get books for the future the baby will be deluged with stuff so you do need things it can necessarily use now friend bought my kid the box set of ladybird fairy tales few years later they re now among her favourite books and most are good length for bedtime story one really amazing set of books is the meg amp mog stories they are enjoyable for adults too for me anyway have really colourful simple artwork and not too much text so great for bedtime stories and for the kid later learning to read with bubbles books puzzles plates cups and bath toys are my go to gifts asked for no presents if they wanted to they could bring some change or book but did want presents little guy had so many forgot to say that for the 2nd birthday party and have toys that have even opened sitting for special days obviously you could do smash cake those are so cute and they really do eat too much of it kohls cares book and stuffy or two books yes the highlights called hello is my year old favorite thing she carries them around and rereads them constantly plus the fact that it is monthly publication means can keep some back issues in the car some in her diaper bag some in my office etc so she got emergency entertainment if she needs it is there local children museum that you could gift membership for or some sort of little kids play attraction indoor play gym if some sort typically give books or educational toys or an outfit that few sizes up or maybe even do something like one of those expensive stainless steal water bottles gift card for mom and dad and an evening of babysitting so mom and dad who survived the first year can celebrate and you get quality one on one time with the kiddo otherwise second most of the other commenters necessary items are always nice diapers wipes baby soap lotions etc and experiences are great too aquarium museums onder why it changed the spelling of some of the words books wagon bike seat umbrella and boots nightlight feeding tools amp cups toddler safe musical instruments expensive snacks like case of freeze dried apples extra baby gates for stairs bird feeder that sticks to the window seed rainbow maker for the window animal hooded towel in toddler size bubbles pass to the childrens museum my son loves it there and guaranteed good nap from him when we get home my sister was making all of my nieces baby food and had been asking me for recipes and advice about using the fillable baby food pouches she did actually have any yet but knew used them got her bunch of pouches and filling station baby nice baby food recipe book plus some board books for my niece she loved it because even though it not technically gift for the baby it something she actually uses all the time my go to is usually handmade blanket or stuffed animal but that just because it my hobby if you know how their room is themed you could go for some artwork that would complement it images are easy enough to find online get it printed in decent quality then matted and framed maybe some sturdy bibs for eating you can also get the mat that sticks to the table you can also ask if they have college fund in place my neighbors ask for no gifts and just add to his college fund as gift savings bonds with note that it contribution for college fund something sentimental like one of those make cast of your baby feet type things gift cards for mom and dad to buy what the baby needs disposable gift my kids love the color changing tablets for the bath sesame street https www amazon com crayola color dropz ounce tablets dp b00009kwtb ref=sr ie=utf8 amp qid=1504116167 amp sr=8 amp keywords=bath+tablets makes some they rinse right out of my tub and does dye the kid bubble bath is also popular money for an resp the kid probably already has everything they need and likely will get more at the party an resp contribution is the gift that keeps on giving probably ninja edit camelback kids water bottle it more of gift for mom but is great quality kid item that makes her life easier they are my favorite because they are truly leak and spill proof then fill it with tickets passes to cool kid event concert in the park the local gymboree or kidventures the children museum the aquarium etc my son got tickets to marvel universe live for his 2nd birthday this last weekend may be too much for yr old but other similar events happen all the time check your local sports arena concert venue for their sunday afternoon wiggles concerts or whatever kid groups they book love the idea of gift cards to target or the disney store that was big hit with my daughter or something else we all enjoyed was plates bowls and flatware sets she also got few of those 360° sippy cups practical items are where it at when you re gifting for year old ha almost 40 and mine are still maturing books the best gift for creating memories one year olds just want to have fun and eat cake they tend to not focus so much on gifts although they do enjoy sparkly new items my best advice is to have single personal cake for the baby for gift maybe something that can be kept for while something like new blanket with matching teddy also necesities are great adn mom will apreciate it as well for example some new pjs sets with beautiful reading book that will encourage reading before bedtime would even include mom in the gift giving because deep down moms do so much that the first year is really celebration that she has made it maybe cute diary or calendar to keep baby appointments keep it short and sweet hope this helps as long as you take lot of pictures it will be very wonderfully memorable day toys brand toys they are gender neutral most come in fuss free packing in amazon and they re cool the funkeys are favorite of mine so is the zany zoo alphaberry the trucks etc my sons would have destroyed magazines they re too active for that so mind the type of kid you re shopping for the ball popper that fisher price has made for years is awesome too boys and girls alike fight life them at play dates gift first birthday party in box so parents can enjoy party as well here are some great options https www shopcrated com collections birthday in box kids copies of your favorite childhood books with recording of you reading them out loud as the baby gets older he or she can follow along in the books
